coverStory.title: From Side Hustle to Superstar: Meet Ramesh, South India’s DSA of the Year
coverStory.subtitle: 3 Lakhs Disbursed, 7 Families Housed, One Relentless Hustler.
body: DILO: 'My busiest Friday — 5 site visits, 2 disbursals.'

hallOfFame.name: Mukesh Singh
hallOfFame.tip: File by noon, payout by Friday.

toolbox.title: Eligibility Follow-Up Script (Hinglish)
toolbox.script: Namaste, Ramesh ji! Paper ready hai toh file aaj hi lag jaye. Payout humesha time pe milta hain—screenshot attached! Koi doubt toh pooch lo.

events.name: HLC Summit 2025
events.summary: Recognized top DSAs with awards. Featured panel: 'Secrets of 10 Lakh Club'.
